name: Product Engineering
description: Your team ships features faster with fewer bugs, reducing time-to-market and technical debt

name: User Experience
description: Users find your product easier to use and stick around longer, reducing churn

name: Social Media Marketing
description: Your social media posts get more engagement and drive actual signups, not just likes

name: Content Marketing
description: Your blog posts and content actually convert readers into customers instead of just getting views

name: Public Relations
description: You know how to pitch journalists and get real press coverage that drives awareness and signups

name: Influencer Marketing
description: You identify the right influencers and negotiate deals that actually drive paying customers

name: Community Building
description: Your users become advocates who share your product with others, creating organic growth

name: Growth Hacking
description: Find creative ways to grow user base

name: Email Marketing
description: Your email campaigns have higher open rates and actually drive conversions, not just unsubscribes

name: SEO Optimization
description: You rank higher in search results, bringing in free organic traffic that converts

name: Paid Advertising
description: Your ad spend generates positive ROI instead of burning cash with no results

name: Partnership Marketing
description: You form partnerships that actually drive revenue, not just vanity metrics

name: Budget Management
description: You stretch every dollar further and avoid wasteful spending that kills startups

name: Pricing Strategy
description: You price your product correctly so customers actually pay without feeling ripped off

name: Fundraising
description: You negotiate better terms with investors and lenders, keeping more equity and paying less interest

name: Financial Analysis
description: You actually understand your unit economics and know when you're profitable or bleeding cash

name: Infrastructure
description: Your servers don't crash when you get a traffic spike, and costs don't explode as you grow

name: Security
description: You prevent data breaches that would destroy customer trust and potentially bankrupt the company

name: DevOps
description: You deploy code without breaking production, and incidents get resolved quickly

name: Database Management
description: Your database queries run fast even with millions of records, keeping costs low

name: Software Engineering
description: Your codebase stays maintainable as you grow, preventing the dreaded rewrite that kills momentum

name: User Research
description: You actually talk to users and build features they want, not what you think they want

name: Product Analytics
description: You use analytics to decide what to build instead of guessing, reducing wasted effort

name: Rapid Iteration
description: You ship updates weekly instead of monthly, staying ahead of competitors

name: Quality Assurance
description: You catch bugs before users do, preventing embarrassing outages and support tickets

name: Product Design
description: Users can figure out your product without reading documentation, reducing support costs

name: User Onboarding
description: New users actually understand your product's value and become active customers, not just signups

name: Mobile Optimization
description: Your mobile app works smoothly and doesn't drain battery, keeping users engaged

name: Accessibility
description: Your product works for users with disabilities, expanding your addressable market

name: API Integration
description: You integrate with tools customers already use, making adoption easier and stickier

name: Personalization
description: Your product adapts to each user's needs, increasing engagement and reducing churn

name: Gamification
description: You add progress tracking and achievements that make users want to come back daily

name: Push Notifications
description: You send notifications that users actually want, not spam that makes them uninstall

name: AI Features
description: You use AI to solve real problems users have, not just add buzzwords to your pitch deck

name: Retargeting
description: You bring back visitors who didn't convert the first time, turning them into customers

name: Affiliate Marketing
description: You create affiliate programs that actually drive sales, not just signups that never convert

name: Webinar Marketing
description: Your webinars actually convert attendees into customers instead of just being educational

name: Video Marketing
description: Your videos get shared and drive signups, not just views with no action

name: Marketing Automation
description: You automate repetitive marketing tasks so your team focuses on strategy, not busywork

name: Accounting
description: You keep accurate books so you know exactly how much money you have and where it's going

name: Tax Optimization
description: You structure your business to minimize taxes without risking audits or penalties

name: Financial Forecasting
description: You forecast cash flow accurately so you never run out of money unexpectedly

name: Investor Relations
description: You keep investors informed and happy, making it easier to raise the next round

name: Cash Flow Management
description: You time payments and collections so money comes in before you need to pay bills

name: Contract Negotiation
description: You negotiate vendor contracts and customer deals that favor your startup, not the other party

name: Equity Management
description: You structure equity correctly from the start, avoiding messy cap tables that kill future fundraising

name: Risk Management
description: You spot financial problems before they become crises, like customer concentration or burn rate issues

name: Regulatory Compliance
description: Stay compliant with regulations

name: M&A Strategy
description: You identify acquisition targets that actually add value, not just vanity purchases

name: Company Valuation
description: You know what makes your company valuable and focus on metrics that actually matter to investors

name: Cloud Architecture
description: You reduce cloud bills by optimizing resources without sacrificing performance or reliability

name: API Development
description: Your APIs handle high traffic without breaking, enabling integrations that drive revenue

name: System Monitoring
description: You catch performance issues before users complain, preventing churn from slow experiences

name: Automated Testing
description: Your automated tests catch bugs before deployment, preventing costly production incidents

name: Scalability
description: Your architecture handles 10x growth without requiring a complete rewrite

name: Microservices
description: You break apart your monolith so teams can work independently without breaking each other's code

name: Caching Strategy
description: You cache data intelligently so pages load instantly without overloading your database

name: CDN Optimization
description: Your content loads fast globally, improving user experience and reducing bounce rates

name: Data Analytics
description: You extract insights from data that actually drive decisions, not just pretty dashboards

name: Machine Learning
description: You use machine learning to solve real problems like personalization and fraud detection
